Song With Arrangements [D]

  tempo: 100
  time: 4/4

  verse: D G A D
  chorus: G A D
  bridge: Bm G A

Sections:
  Verse 1:
    ^First verse ^line one
    ^First verse ^line two

  Verse 2:
    ^Second verse ^line one
    ^Second verse ^line two

  Chorus:
    ^Chorus ^line ^here

  Bridge:
    ^Bridge ^line one
    ^Bridge ^line two

  Short:
    Verse 1
    Chorus

  Full:
    Verse 1
    Chorus
    Verse 2
    Chorus

    Chorus
